mapper.sql: id, orderNo, userId, addressId, totalAmount, payAmount, status, payTime, deliveryTime, receiveTime, remark, createTime, updateTime
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO `order` (orderNo, userId, addressId, totalAmount, payAmount, status, remark) VALUES (#{orderNo}, #{userId}, #{addressId}, #{totalAmount}, #{payAmount}, #{status}, #{remark})
mapper.select: SELECT o.id, o.orderNo, o.userId, o.addressId, o.totalAmount, o.payAmount, o.status, o.payTime, o.deliveryTime, o.receiveTime, o.remark, o.createTime, o.updateTime, u.id as u_id, u.usern as u_usern, u.realN as u_realN, u.phone as u_phone, a.id as a_id, a.receiverN as a_receiverN, a.receiverPhone as a_receiverPhone, a.province as a_province, a.city as a_city, a.district as a_district, a.detailAddress as a_detailAddress FROM `order` o LEFT JOIN user u ON o.userId = u.id LEFT JOIN address a ON o.addressId = a.id WHERE o.id = #{id}
SELECT FROM `order` WHERE userId = #{userId} ORDER BY createTime DESC

SELECT o.id, o.orderNo, o.userId, o.addressId, o.totalAmount, o.payAmount, o.status, o.payTime, o.deliveryTime, o.receiveTime, o.remark, o.createTime, o.updateTime, u.id as u_id, u.usern as u_usern, u.realN as u_realN, u.phone as u_phone, a.id as a_id, a.receiverN as a_receiverN, a.receiverPhone as a_receiverPhone, a.province as a_province, a.city as a_city, a.district as a_district, a.detailAddress as a_detailAddress FROM `order` o LEFT JOIN user u ON o.userId = u.id LEFT JOIN address a ON o.addressId = a.id ORDER BY o.createTime DESC
SELECT FROM `order` WHERE status = #{status} ORDER BY createTime DESC
SELECT IFNULL(SUM(payAmount), 0) FROM `order` WHERE status IN (1, 2, 3)
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM `order` WHERE DATE(createTime) = CURDATE()
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM `order` WHERE YEAR(createTime) = YEAR(CURDATE()) AND MONTH(createTime) = MONTH(CURDATE())
